privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At MS Solutions, we value your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

sections.heading: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you fill out a contact form, request a demo, or communicate with us. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and company name.

sections.heading: 2. How We Use Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to respond to your comments and questions, and to send you related information, including confirmations and updates.

sections.heading: 3. Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect the security of your personal information.

sections.heading: 4. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at info@msforsolutions.com.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before using our website and services operated by MS Solutions.

sections.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, then you may not access the service.

sections.heading: 2. Intellectual Property
sections.content: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of MS Solutions and its licensors.

sections.heading: 3. Links To Other Web Sites
sections.content: Our service may contain links to third-party web sites or services that are not owned or controlled by MS Solutions.

sections.heading: 4. Changes
sections.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time.
